Describe your issue: Hey there, I am not facing any issue but I just wanted to reach out and suggest something as a canva user and a content creator. It will be very helpful to navigate through content if there's a way to search for my designs. Let me give you a real example- I have been using canva for more than a year so I've got a lot of designs. Now it has become difficult for me to search for a specific design. I need to scroll all the way to find the design I need. If there's a search box or something like that where I can type the name of the design am searching for, that would be dope. Just some food for thought. I have no complaints. You guys are awesome, I just love canva.
